oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge certificate for Pvt. Calvin Mooneyhan, Co. F, 5th Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Discharge certificate for Pvt. Calvin Mooneyhan. Mooneyhan was born about 1835 in Bledsoe County, Tennessee. He enlisted in Co. F, 5th Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA, on February 20, 1862, and served until his discharge on March 29, 1865. Mooneyhan was married; to Mary "Polly" (Hall). His exact date of death is unknown. However, he died sometime prior to July 19, 1907, when his wife, Mary, filed a widow's pension claim. Mooneyhan is buried in Blackburn Cemetery in Bledsoe County, Tennessee.
